Sentencas: La0.6Sr0.4Fe0.9Nb0.1O3-delta (LSFN) and La0.6Sr0.4Fe0.8Nb0.1Cu0.1O3-delta (LSFNCu) perovskite oxides are prepared as catalysts for C2H6 dehydrogenation.
Titulo: Cogeneration of ethylene and electricity in symmetrical protonic solid oxide fuel cells based on a La0.6Sr0.4Fe0.8Nb0.1Cu0.1O3-δ electrode

Sentencas: The partial substitution of Fe by Cu enhances the structural stability and significantly increases the formation of oxygen vacancies and also the oxidation states of the Fe cations.
Titulo: Cogeneration of ethylene and electricity in symmetrical protonic solid oxide fuel cells based on a La0.6Sr0.4Fe0.8Nb0.1Cu0.1O3-δ electrode

Sentencas: The performances of the catalysts are investigated from 650 to 750 degrees C in a fixed-bed reactor.
Titulo: Cogeneration of ethylene and electricity in symmetrical protonic solid oxide fuel cells based on a La0.6Sr0.4Fe0.8Nb0.1Cu0.1O3-δ electrode

Sentencas: The C2H6 conversion by LSFNCu is about 42% at 750 degrees C, which is obviously higher than that by LSFN (37.8%).
Titulo: Cogeneration of ethylene and electricity in symmetrical protonic solid oxide fuel cells based on a La0.6Sr0.4Fe0.8Nb0.1Cu0.1O3-δ electrode

Sentencas: Furthermore, a symmetrical protonic solid oxide fuel cell reactor with the configuration of LSFNCu/BZCYYb/LSFNCu is prepared to cogenerate ethylene and electricity from ethane.
Titulo: Cogeneration of ethylene and electricity in symmetrical protonic solid oxide fuel cells based on a La0.6Sr0.4Fe0.8Nb0.1Cu0.1O3-δ electrode

Sentencas: At 750 degrees C, the peak power density of the symmetrical cell reaches 90 mW cm(-2) in C2H6.
Titulo: Cogeneration of ethylene and electricity in symmetrical protonic solid oxide fuel cells based on a La0.6Sr0.4Fe0.8Nb0.1Cu0.1O3-δ electrode

Sentencas: Meanwhile, C2H6 conversion is about 41.5% at OCV conditions and can be increased to 43.4% under a constant current of 200 mA cm(-2).
Titulo: Cogeneration of ethylene and electricity in symmetrical protonic solid oxide fuel cells based on a La0.6Sr0.4Fe0.8Nb0.1Cu0.1O3-δ electrode

Sentencas: This indicates that the consumption of the formed H-2 promotes the dehydrogenation reactions.
Titulo: Cogeneration of ethylene and electricity in symmetrical protonic solid oxide fuel cells based on a La0.6Sr0.4Fe0.8Nb0.1Cu0.1O3-δ electrode

Sentencas: The performance of the fuel cell reactor is essentially stable during the 40 h test, confirming that LSFNCu is an excellent coking resistant electrocatalyst for cogeneration of C2H4 and electricity from ethane.
Titulo: Cogeneration of ethylene and electricity in symmetrical protonic solid oxide fuel cells based on a La0.6Sr0.4Fe0.8Nb0.1Cu0.1O3-δ electrode
